transArray.content: The service is very good, the hotel environment is good, and there are free drinks

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. Such a location provides guests with great convenience for eating, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staffâ€™s service. Your pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! Manager: Ji Hongjiao
